articles.title: Pat Cipollone, Trump’s White House Counsel, Testifies Friday
articles.type: Donald Trump’s former White House counsel went to Capitol Hill to testify behind closed doors to the House select committee investigating the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.1935 min read

articles.title: U.S. Moves to End Tax Treaty With Hungary
articles.type: The Treasury Department is moving to terminate its tax treaty with Hungary, ending an agreement with a country that has been resisting the global minimum tax deal pushed by the Biden administration.4 min read

articles.title: Biden Signs Executive Order on Abortion, Contraception Access
articles.type: The order would direct agencies to take steps to protect access to abortions and the privacy of patients seeking reproductive health services, following the overturning of Roe v. Wade.7454 min read

articles.title: U.S. Border Agents Used Unnecessary Force Against Haitian Migrants, Report Says
articles.type: An internal review said the agents on horseback involved in the widely publicized incident last year were acting at the request of Texas state police.5 min read

articles.title: Russian, Western Diplomats Clash at G-20 Gathering in Bali
articles.type: Tensions over the war in Ukraine dominated the meetings, with Moscow’s foreign minister claiming “frenzied Russophobia.”3 min read

articles.title: Biden Administration Asks Supreme Court to Rule on Immigration Enforcement
articles.type: Texas and Louisiana won a circuit-court ruling blocking U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement guidelines narrowing detention efforts to target noncitizens deemed most threatening.4 min read

articles.title: Florida Man Who Threatened to Kill Rep. Ilhan Omar Sentenced to Three Years of Probation
articles.type: David Hannon sent an email to Ms. Omar’s office after she and other congresswomen held a news briefing in July 2019.3 min read
